Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a dark-red pottery vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse and grey-black in section, the exterior is partially grey in colour and bears the remains of two lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394816) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394816)
